data.quote: The price of freedom is high. It always has been.
data.author: Steve Rogers, CAPTAIN AMERICA: THE WINTER SOLDIER

data.quote: I don’t like bullies. I don’t care where they’re from.
data.author: Steve Rogers, CAPTAIN AMERICA: THE WINTER SOLDIER

data.quote: But in times of crisis the wise build bridges, while the foolish build barriers.
data.author: T’Challa, BLACK PANTHER

data.quote: I shouldn’t be alive, unless it was for a reason, I know what I have to do, and I know it is right.
data.author: Tony Stark, IRON MAN

data.quote: It’s not enough to be against something. You have to be for something better.
data.author: Tony Stark, IRON MAN

data.quote: It’s not about how much we lost; it’s about how much we have left.
data.author: Tony Stark, IRON MAN

data.quote: Part of the journey is the end.
data.author: Tony Stark, IRON MAN

data.quote: I choose to run towards my problems, and not away from them. Because’s that– because’s that what heroes do.
data.author: Thor, THOR: RAGNAROK

data.quote: It's an imperfect world but it's the only one we got.
data.author: Tony Stark, IRON MAN

data.quote: Everyone fails at who they are supposed to be, Thor. The measure of a person, of a hero, is how well they succeed at being who they are.
data.author: Frigga , Mother of thor , Queen of Asgard
